title.rendered: Air KBZ Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Air KBZ is a privately owned domestic Myanmar airline based in Yangon. Air Kanbawza, otherwise known as AIR KBZ, was established in June 2010. The airline is owned by Kanbawza Bank and began operations with a Yangon-Bagan-Nyaung Oo-Mandalay-Heho-Yangon flight on 2 April 2011. In 2015 Air KBZ began codesharing international flights with its partner Myanmar Airways International, but on 2 December 2016 Air KBZ itself expanded internationally, launching its first scheduled service outside Myanmar with flights connecting Yangon and Chiang Mai in neighboring Thailand.

 Air KBZ  Address:No.88, International Business Center (IBC), 2nd Floor, Pyay Road, (11) Quarter,
Hlaing Township, Yangon 11051, Myananmar

Phone Number : 095 1 9670014~20 and ext: 200-206

How to change the flight route / flight date in Air KBZ?

If you want to change the route / date of the flight, please call 095 1 9670014~20 and ext: 200-206

Fax : (01) 653313

Email id :  info@airkbz.com.mm

For ticketing enquiries / refund, please contact  ticketing@airkbz.com.mm

Air KBZ  Official website: https://airkbz.com/

Air KBZ – Ticketing & Sales Office in Myanmar

Air KBZ airline office in Mandalay, Myanmar

Address: No.6, 78th Street, between of 29×30 street, SY Building, Chan Aye Thar Zan Township, Mandalay
Phone: +95 (09) 250 204 311, (02) 402 4862-3

Air KBZ airline office in Nyaung U, Myanmar

Address: No.3 Zone, Aung Theindi Quarter, Corner of Anawyahtar Street Nyaung U Kyauktada Main Point, Nyaung U
Phone: +95 (061) 246 1186-7, (061) 611 88 (Airport)

Air KBZ airline office in Kalay, Myanmar

Address: No.3/3, Bogyoke Street, Pinlon Block, Kalay
Phone: +95 (09) 406 662 225, (09) 761 934 445, (073) 22740

Air KBZ airline office in Myitkyina, Myanmar

Address: No.(Ne/78), Tabinshwehtee Road, Myothit Quarter, Myitkyina
Phone: +95 (074) 252 9267, 252 9182, (09) 406 662 224, (09) 430 889 78, (09) 250 204 309

Air KBZ airline office in Khamti, Myanmar

Address: No.138, Bogyoke Road, Myoma Quarter, Khamti
Phone: +95 (09) 406 662 223, (09) 796 730 917

Air KBZ airline office in Taunggyi, Myanmar

Address: No.94, Bogyoke Aung San Road, Lanmadaw Quarter, Taunggyi
Phone: +95 (081) 212 768, (09) 250 204 313

Air KBZ airline office in Lashio, Myanmar

Address: No.(Za/8), Corner of Pyi Htung Su Main Road & Tharapee Street, 8 Quarter, Lashio
Phone: +95 (09) 406 662 221, (09) 431 201 58, (082) 292 5263

Air KBZ airline office in Tachileik, Myanmar

Address: No.3, Beside of KBZ Bank-2, Bogyoke Road, Mae Khaung Quarter, Tachileik
Phone: +95 (09) 406 662 219, (09) 250 204 315, (084) 535 02-03

Air KBZ airline office in Thandwe, Myanmar

Address: No.49, coner of Thitsar St & Bayin Naung St, (3) Quarter, Thandwe
Phone: +95 (09) 863 5285, (043) 655 63, (043) 420 78 (Airport)

Air KBZ airline office in Sittwe, Myanmar

Phone: +95-9-42537912

Air KBZ airline office in Nay Pyi Taw, Myanmar

Address: KBZ Bank-5, Yarza Thhingaha Road, Tha Pyay Gone Ward, Zabuthiri Township, Nay Pyi Taw
Phone: +95 (067) 810 8421, (09) 430 591 19, (09) 997 880 320

Air KBZ airline office in Loikaw, Myanmar

Address: No.214, U Pain No.61, 49 /B, Lawpita Street, Law Damma Quarter, Loikaw
Phone: +95 (09) 977 880 290, (09) 795 844 473

Air KBZ airline office in Dawei, Myanmar

Address: No.14, Near of KBZ Bank-1, Nate Ban Road, Myo Twin Quarter, Dawei
Phone: +95 (059) 406 662 215, (09) 506 6418, (09) 977 880 340

Air KBZ airline office in Myeik, Myanmar

Phone: +95-9-799856339

Air KBZ airline office in Kawthaung, Myanmar

Address: No.205, Bogyoke Road, Bayint Naung Quarter, Kawthaung
Phone: +95 (09) 406 662 217, (09) 250 471 353

 Queries handled by Air KBZ Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries, Sky Smile.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air KBZ Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air KBZ Airlines : (click on the stars below)
